fields.name: uprn
fields.title: UPRN
fields.description: The Unique Property Reference Number for the location.

fields.name: service
fields.title: Service
fields.description: The type of service that is provided. e.g. Recycling

fields.name: schedule
fields.title: Schedule
fields.description: For example, alternate weekly on Monday.

fields.name: round
fields.title: Round
fields.description: An identifier for a round, or set of properties visited by a crew.

fields.name: round_sequence
fields.title: Round sequence
fields.description: The order of collections in the round.

fields.name: container
fields.title: Container
fields.description: The containers assigned to the property or place.
